alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 26 at 3:24PM CDT until March 26 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR WESTERN MADISON AND NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN PARISHES... At 323 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crowville, or 13 miles east of Winnsboro, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Waverly around 340 PM CDT. Tendal around 345 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
